show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

title: The One-Party System in America
content:
Jack provides his running commentary on the fiscal cliff negotiations and then introduces guest, Art Lipow, to discuss... <!--more--> the formation and experience of the British Labor party and its lessons and relevance to forming a true second party in the US.
  The US One party system with two wings—Democrat and Republican—is contrasted to a real alternative second party.
Dr Rasmus and Art Lipow, previously a long time participant in the British labor party, discuss the possibilities and differences in forming a labor party in the US
